channel.title: CVE Feed for Atlassian -- Confluence
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atlassian -- Confluence

item.title: CVE-2017-18085|2024-09-17T03:22:54.533Z -- atlassian -- confluence
item.description: The viewdefaultdecorator resource in Atlassian Confluence Server before version 6.6.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTML or JavaScript via a cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability through the key parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-13389|2024-09-17T01:15:40.877Z -- atlassian -- confluence
item.description: The attachment resource in Atlassian Confluence before version 6.6.1 allows remote attackers to spoof web content in the Mozilla Firefox Browser through attachments that have a content-type of application/rdf+xml.
